OverveiwCard.fastPref: Dynamic Software Developer with a real passion for coding and solving problems. Proficient in modern web tech like React, Next.js, Node.js, and AI-powered tools. And I’ve already built real-world projects and I’m always ready to learn more. I thrive in a collaborative environment and aim to build clean, user-friendly experiences that actually work.

Experince.intro: In the world of software, real ability is proven by building and shipping real projects, not just collecting certificates . . . So My journey is defined by hands-on experience, where every project has been a lesson in creativity, problem-solving, and growth.
Experince.subtitle: A showcase of my practical journey
Experince.description: From freelance gigs to collaborative team efforts, each experience here reflects my commitment to delivering value and learning through doing. Explore the projects below to see how I turn ideas into working solutions.
Experince.devMessage: To see the source of code Just . .

projects.title: E-Commerce
projects.desc: Full-stack project showcasing front-end and back-end integration with API handling.

projects.title: Dynamic Form Generator
projects.desc: An application that allows users to generate multiple fully customized forms with their links.

projects.title: Some Skills
projects.desc: Snippets of mini projects that highlight different skills.

projects.title: Hotels App
projects.desc: Hotel App to show some search and filter logics.

projects.title: Name Generator
projects.desc: A simple name generation algorithm with basic options and inactive AI integration.

projects.title: Front-End Layouts Collection
projects.desc: Some simple front-end layouts for some pages without any functionality. Just CSS.
